def send_data_to_server():
  global led_input, mutex_block, fan_input, temp, F_flag, timer1, priority, humidity, ABSTRACT_PASS, timer2, in_led_status, light, PASS, STATUS, refresh, error_count, ADMIN, OLD_PASS, rgb_flag, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_ir_rx
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  temp = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  humidity = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  light = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(temp)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(humidity)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(light)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  mqtt.publish('temp', temp)
  mqtt.publish('humidity', humidity)
  mqtt.publish('light', light)
  if mutex_block == 0:
    check_danger()

def check_danger():
  global led_input, mutex_block, fan_input, temp, F_flag, timer1, priority, humidity, ABSTRACT_PASS, timer2, in_led_status, light, PASS, STATUS, refresh, error_count, ADMIN, OLD_PASS, rgb_flag, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, tiny_rgb, aiot_ir_rx
  mutex_block = 1
  if pin14.read_digital()==0:
    priority = 2
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Warning !!!')
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Possible fire')
    pin12.write_digital((0))
    sound_alarm()
    time.sleep_ms(5000)
    music.stop()
    refresh = 1
    priority = 0
  if light < 40 or (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) >= 18:
    mqtt.publish('led', '1')
  else:
    mqtt.publish('led', '0')
  if temp >= 35 and temp < 45:
    mqtt.publish('fan', '50')
  else:
    mqtt.publish('fan', '0')
  if accelerometer.sensor.shake(11):
    priority = 2
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Warning !!!')
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Earthquake !!!')
    pin12.write_digital((0))
    sound_alarm()
    time.sleep_ms(5000)
    music.stop()
    refresh = 1
    priority = 0
  mutex_block = 0

    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Time out !!!')
